content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences, but I have access to vast amounts of data and knowledge about positive guest experiences at hotels. Positive experiences can range from excellent customer service and attention to detail to excellent room amenities and proximity to attractions. Some other factors that guests may find positive include comfortable bedding, a quiet environment, prompt room service, and access to on-site facilities like a gym, pool, or spa. Many hotels go above and beyond to ensure their guests have a memorable and enjoyable stay, providing activities, local recommendations, and other little touches like welcome gifts or complimentary breakfasts.
